Ahmed
When I arrived...everything was full of
soldiers.
Ahmed
To get to the exit, I had to pass
over there. But I couldn't get close to anyone,
or they would catch me!
Help Ahmed escape from the soldiers! Reach the
bottom of the map without being seen!
A
Siria_5_Soldado
Do you know what I do to people who
try to tease me?
this._chaseRange = 3
Siria_1_Soldado
Ha! You thought you'd scape, didn't you?
this._chaseRange = 3
Siria_6_Soldado
You're not going any further...
this._chaseRange = 3
